QuestData.Title: Scarlet Salvage
QuestData.Description: This battle was won before it started. Right now, we're just shooting for style points.$b$bWithin these barracks, the sniveling Scarlet Crusaders cling to their priceless artifacts, even though some of the objects are too holy for their now-undead hand to touch. So they keep them in chests, hidden from the world.$b$bYou will find these artifacts, and bring them back to me. They belong to the Argent Crusade. They belong in the hands of the righteous.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Crimson Boar, Lihanna's Strand, the Shroud of Uther, and Gavinrad's Sigil.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope you gave them a fight.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. I will deliver these to Tyrosus when we return.
